verses.name: Psalms 85:1
verses.text: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.

verses.name: Psalms 85:2
verses.text: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 85:3
verses.text: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.

verses.name: Psalms 85:4
verses.text: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.

verses.name: Psalms 85:5
verses.text: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?

verses.name: Psalms 85:6
verses.text: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
